summary.para: Proxy setting indicates HTTP proxy setting for the channel with binding . This is specified as part of channel property.
The channel will automatically detect the proxy setting based on the IE configuration for the user at the point the channel is opened. This is the default setting for the .
No proxy will be used to service the request on the channel.

If an application chooses to explicitly control the HTTP proxy it can use this setting. The property specifies the custom proxy to be used with the channel and must be set on the channel if this setting is used.
